thread.section_title: Latest Kendall Jenner Updates on the Victoria's Secret Modelo | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: paints room pink to suppress her appetite
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner paints room pink to suppress her appetite | Daily Mail Online

author: Mail Online Reporter
title: paints room pink to suppress her appetite
text:
Kendall Jenner painted her room pink to 'suppress' her appetite.
The 21-year-old Keeping Up With the Kardashians star has admitted she redecorated her room with a baby-doll shade of rose in a bid to keep off the hunger pangs, which is a tip her friends advised her to do after they visited an art exhibition.
Speaking on her website kendallj.com about her diet tips, the brunette beauty said: 'I decided to paint [my room] pink because while I was trying to figure out what I wanted to do with the room, I went to dinner with friends and they had just gone to the Human Condition exhibition at a former hospital in LA.
Scroll down for video
Thinking pink: Kendall Jenner, pictured strutting down the Chanel catwalk last month, apparently painted her room a shade of pink to suppress her appetite
'They were telling me there's a pink room at the exhibit that had an explanation of the colour choice: Baker-Miller Pink is the only colour scientifically proven to calm you AND suppress your appetite. I was like, 'I NEED this colour in my house!'
Last year the star splashed out $6.5million on a six-bedroom, five-bathroom Hollywood Hills mansion which belonged to Emily Blunt and John Krasinski.
Nestled in the crevice of a canyon and right above the iconic Chateau Marmont Hotel, the multimillion dollar residence boats a walk-in closet, swimming pool and rooftop patio.
Catwalk ready: The star showed off her super slim figure at the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show last November
Meanwhile, the catwalk icon has admitted she will change her outfit to wear more revealing ensembles, such as sheer tops without a bra, when she's having 'a good boob day' so she can flaunt her ample assets.
Speaking about her style choices, the television personality said: 'I don't know if you can relate, but I just felt like I was having a really good boob day, lol.
The catwalk icon, – who has modelled for Victoria's Secret, Fendi and Balmain – has seen her modelling career go from strength to strength in recent years, after finding fame on the family reality show.
Calming: Kendall posted a snapshot of a pink room at Christmas on her Instagram
'Do you know what I mean? Your boobs go through phases and on this particular day, I felt like they just looked nice! (sic)'
However, the star has admitted she does consult her fellow model friends, Hailey Baldwin and Gigi Hadid, before she posts images of her in risqué outfits on social media.
She explained: 'My shirt was see-through, so I took this photo and just texted it to Hailey and Gigi before I left to meet them and was like, "Is this too much?" she continued. 'They wrote back, "It's kind of a lot, but if you're into it, go for it!"
More risque: Kendall admitted she consults her friends Hailey Baldwin and Gigi Hadid before donning any revealing ensembles
